Name: Trap Tag
About the game: Trap Tag is a fast paced, exciting and fun local multiplayer game with a variety of silly characters to choose from. Get your friends together, select your characters and battle to become the ultimate tag champion. Use traps to trip up your rivals whilst rocking out to a heart pounding soundtrack. Trap tag requires at least one controller to play but also supports keyboard and mouse. Trap Tag is made by Blossom Studios, a small independent game studio making a series of experimental games.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Trap Tag? Check out the release date (May 20, 2021), developer insights from Blossom Studios, and a complete game summary.
